title: FS- Cobb Red & Bat On, Matty, Lajoie, Bender (Prices Lowered)
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS- Cobb Red & Bat On, Matty, Lajoie, Bender (Prices Lowered)
posts.post_content:
Hi guys, I'm looking to sell some of my HOFers. I accept  PayPal  for these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular  PayPal.  Shipping is on me.  Scans available on  request.

Cobb Red Portrait, Piedmont 350, SGC 20- [strike]$775[/strike][strike]$700[/strike]sold
Cobb Bat on Shoulder, Piedmont 150, Raw- [strike]$625[/strike][strike]$575[/strike]sold
       *full disclosure, I soaked paper stuck to the back off this card,                    used warm distilled water for about 5 minutes*
Mathewson, Portrait, Sweet Caporal 350 fac 30, SGC 20- [strike]$285[/strike]$[strike]235[/strike][STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE]pending
Lajoie With Bat (flip says portrait), Piedmont 350, SGC 20- [strike]$125[/strike]sold
Bender, Pitching, No Trees, Old Mill, SGC 30- [strike]$115[/strike]$95


PM, or e-mail with questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
Bump for lower prices on remaining cards, make an offer!
